# amux

**This is an alias package for [devswarm](https://pypi.org/project/devswarm/).**

Multi-agent coordination for AI coding assistants. Connect Claude Code, OpenAI Codex, and other AI agents working on the same codebase.

## Installation

```bash
pip install amux
# or
pip install devswarm
```

Both packages provide identical functionality.

## Quick Start

```bash
amux setup
```

Or if using devswarm directly:

```bash
devswarm setup
```

## Documentation

See the main package documentation: [devswarm on GitHub](https://github.com/jude-hawrani/devswarm)
